title: Infiniteskills CisNA Certification Bundle_2013
description:
contains:

Cisco 100-101 (ICND1) Exam Training
Cisco 200-101 (ICND2) Exam Training

In order to obtain your CCNA Routing and Switching certification, you are required to pass two exams - ICND1 and ICND2. This training bundle contains everything you will need to study and prepare to pass both of those exams and become a CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate).

In the Cisco ICND1 (100-101) training course, you will learn the fundamentals that are required to operate a small office network. Greg ensures that you are familiar with the interconnecting IP data networks, LAN Switching, IPv4 and IPv6, DHCP, NAT, ACLs and more. The Cisco ICND2 (200-101) tutorial is the second exam you are required to pass for your full CCNA certificate. For this you will learn about FHRP, Syslog, troubleshooting, WAN technologies, SNMP v2 & v3, IP routing technologies, and everything else you will need to pass the exam.

Once you have completed both of these training courses, you will be fully prepared to take the two exams that will certify you as a CCNA, the first step towards your Professional and Expert Cisco certifications! Working files are included for both courses, allowing you to follow along with the author throughout the lessons.
